column2: BA

column2: Senior Scientist
column7: Tech Lead of multiple reference control NPIs, custom OEMs, and commercial releases. Includes the *Pan-cancer RNA Fusion Controls*, *Fragmentome Calibration Controls*, *CNV Controls*, *Pan-cancer cfDNA v2*, and RNA-seq.
column8: Mentored a direct report from Senior Research Associate to Scientist to serving as a Tech Lead on new product introductions
column9: Original research led to multiple outside presentations and applications for patent protection of product configuration and biochemical methods.
column10: Custom data analysis pipeline in R and Python demonstrated proof-of-concept design and QC success of the Pan-cancer RNA Fusion Controls; designed and implemented the production approach; used public databases and feedback from alpha testers to design configuration of fusions RNAs
column11: Led new technology evaluation of a new NGS platform with custom experiments and bioinformatic analyses in Python, R, and SQL to enable faster gene QC in Production. Also led ancillary experiments to speed up synthetic gene production. Coded, implemented, and distributed on company GitHub an internal package, _`twistcolorpal`_, that automatically adds Twist-brand colors to `ggplot2` plots and sets up database connectors to `SQL` / Snowflake for parameterized `dbplyr` querying. Regularly use R, tidyverse, Python, Polars, AWS `s3`, `Spark`, `PySpark`, and `Sparklyr`, locally and on Databricks.

column2: Scientist
column7: Tech Lead of *Pan-Cancer Reference Standard*, an ISO-13485 synthetic positive control with 458 unique variants among 84 cancer-associated genes at six QC'd VAFs, plus a WT control, which launched in Nov of 2021
column8: Designed, implemented, & validated primer removal procedure for DNA standards *that is compatible with methylation*
column9: Devised and validated precise high-throughput DNA quantification process for accurate pooling
column10: Led multiple iterations of custom NGS analysis refined the QC approach and thresholds for ensuring a contamination-free production process; extensively used data visualization to communicate complex data to cross-functional collaboration teams.
column11: Made extensive use of UMI sequencing and created novel method to rigorously quantify library conversion efficiency to evaluate product and potential secondary sources

column2: Scientist I
column7: Designed and implemented an automated high-throughput genotyping assay
column8: Designed & carried out complex experiments on automation with and without LIMS sample tracking
column9: Supported a company-wide NGS core under high demand from diverse groups with complex needs using data-driven decision making and teaching
column10: Used statistical methods to screen and optimize a genetic engineering protocol for newly-on-boarded microbe; delivered robust process while working on New Product Introduction team
column11: Built hundreds of plasmids using modern molecular cloning techniques like Gibson and Golden Gate

column2: Doctoral Research
column3: University of Colorado School of Medicine
column7: Wrote, revised, & published two academic papers on RNA repair & yeast genetics
column8: Engineered and characterized genetic bypass of essential genes in budding yeast; on-boarded CRISPR/Cas9 for efficient and precise gene knock-in
column9: Expressed, purified, and used wild-type and mutant recombinant protein in _E. coli_ to carry out an RNA modification enzymatic assay
column10: Optimized custom RNA-seq library protocol; independently planned, executed, troubleshooted RNA modification detection
column11: Routinely conducted northern blotting, targeted depletion, primer extension, splinted ligation, and other esoteric DNA and RNA experiments
